issue.title: Add a 'backend only' flag on organisms categories
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We have 'admin' or 'technical' categories that we don't want front end users to select (in access scopes, pricing ...)

Proposal :
* Add a 'backend only' flag on organisms categories.
* Never display those categories in the front end (access scopes lists, pricing rebates, pricing free in profiles,...)

Does it have an impact on java (since model evolves) ?

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
